title: Dirty Playboy
description: He’s obsessed with her.She wants nothing to do with him.Rick Lawrence doesn’t get attached to women. He beds them and sends them on their way.Then, he sees her.Mary Patrick is the ultimate good girl—religious, moral, responsible. She spends all her time at church or with her nose in a book.The second he lays eyes on her he must have her.She makes him want to be better.He doesn’t even look at another woman for seven months.She denies him every step of the way.When he finally wears her down, gets his one big chance—his past catches up with him.Secrets are revealed that threaten everything.The only question that remains is…Can they survive it? Or will it destroy both of them?
author: Sloane Howell
